meanings.definition: A type of skin cancer that develops from the pigment-producing cells in the skin.
meanings.sent1: Melanomas can be dangerous if not detected early.
meanings.sent2: The doctor found melanomas during the skin check.
meanings.sent3: Even though it sounds funny, the melanomas were like tiny paint spots on his skin.
meanings.sent4: Her freckles seemed to dance around the melanomas like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The melanomas spread like wildfire, causing concern among the medical team.
